How can I convert vETH, DAI.vETH, or MKR.vETH into Bridge.vETH?

To convert vETH, DAI.vETH, or MKR.vETH into Bridge.vETH, you need to fill in a form with the following information:

1. Amount: Specify the amount of vETH, DAI.vETH, or MKR.vETH you want to convert.
2. From Currency: Enter the currency you want to convert from (vETH, DAI.vETH, or MKR.vETH).
3. To Currency: Enter Bridge.vETH as the currency you want to convert to.
4. Destination Address: Enter the address where you want to receive the Bridge.vETH.
5. Send as pre-convert: Check this box.
6. Refund Address: Enter an address where you will receive your funds back in case the minimum preconversion amount is not met.

After filling in the form, click "Convert Currencies" and confirm the transaction. You will then have successfully preconverted your funds into Bridge.vETH.

You only need to fill in the highlighted parts of the form. See below:
Amount: how much of vETH, DAI.vETH or MKR.vETH you want to convert to Bridge.vETH
From Currency: Fill in vETH, DAI.vETH or MKR.vETH (not case sensitive)
To Currency: Fill in Bridge.vETH (not case sensitive)
Destination Address: Fill in where you want to receive the Bridge.vETH (on Fri 20 Oct). Can be a R-address, i-address or VerusID.
Send as pre-convert: Check this
Refund Address: Sometimes a currency has a minimum or maximum amount to preconvert before it launches. For example, when the minimum preconversion amount is not met, and thus the currency not launched, you will receive your funds back. In this case there isn’t a minimum or maximum but you still need to fill it in. Can be the same as your Destination Address.
Now click on “Convert Currencies” and confirm the transaction. You have now preconverted funds into Bridge.vETH!
